Method Detail

getConfig

public static com.google.gson.JsonObject getConfig(Cluster cluster,
                                                   Node node,
                                                   Service service,
                                                   ProvisionerAction action)
Create a configuration json object to use for a given cluster, node, service, and action.

Parameters:
cluster - Cluster to use.
node - Node that configuration will be sent to.
service - Service that the configuration is for.
action - Action that will be performed that needs the configuration.
Returns:
Configuration json object to use for a given cluster, node, service, and action.

updateNodeProperties

public static com.google.gson.JsonObject updateNodeProperties(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObject,
                                                              Node node)
Add all the properties from the node into the given json object configuration.

Parameters:
jsonObject - Configuration to update.
node - Node containing properties that need to be copied to the given configuration.
Returns:
Updated json object.

addNodeList

public static com.google.gson.JsonObject addNodeList(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObject,
                                                     Set<Node> clusterNodes)
Add all node properties to a json object configuration.

Parameters:
jsonObject - Configuration to add node properties to.
clusterNodes - Set of nodes whose properties need to be added to the configuration.
Returns:
Updated json object.
